content.en: Eye-tracking algorithms: Researchers have been investigating different algorithms to improve the analysis of eye-tracking data. They have compared dispersion-based algorithms and velocity-based algorithms to identify fixations and eye movements. Other studies have explored the use of cluster analysis, Bayesian microsaccade detection, and hidden Markov models to accurately classify eye movement events. These algorithms aim to provide more accurate and reliable results in the analysis of eye-tracking data.
content.da: Øjensporingsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre analysen af øjensporingsdata. De har sammenlignet dispersionsbaserede algoritmer og hastighedsbaserede algoritmer for at identificere fikseringer og øjenbevægelser. Andre studier har udforsket brugen af klyngeanalyse, Bayesiansk mikrosaccadedetektion og skjulte Markov-modeller for nøjagtigt at klassificere øjenbevægelser. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at levere mere præcise og pålidelige resultater i analysen af øjensporingsdata.
